text:
League 1
Nice: blow for Claude-Maurice
OGC winger Nice Alexis Claude-Maurice suffers from an injury to a calf. Patrick Vieira will not be able to count on the 21-year-old for the Girondins de Bordeaux reception on Friday for the 13th day.
06 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Mourad Bennis



Alfred GomisDijonIcon Sport



Youcef AtalOGC NiceIcon Sport



William SalibaASSEIcon Sport



Edson MexerBordeauxIcon Sport



Jordan AmaviOMIcon Sport



Didier NdongDijonIcon Sport



Baptiste SantamariaAngersIcon Sport



Gael KakutaAmiensIcon Sport



Ui-jo HwangBordeauxIcon Sport



Memphis DepayOLIcon Sport



Denis BouangaASSEIcon Sport



St√©phane JobardDijonIcon Sport

Bouanga, Depay, Amavi ... the typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1




It's a blow for Nice. Alexis Claude-Maurice will not be able to take part in the match against the Girondins de Bordeaux this Friday night. Indeed, the attacker born in Noisy-le-Grand suffers from an injury to a calf.




An offensive sector plagued by injuries




Alexis Claude-Maurice + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Patrick Vieira definitely has no luck with his attackers. Alexis Claude-Maurice will not participate in the meeting of Nice against Bordeaux this Friday night due to a injury to a calf according to the team. Kasper Dolberg and Adam Ounas are expected to return but, once again, the Nice coach will not be able to line up this trio so promising.
